Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Moscow (Marfino), Hotel Sherston is close to Moscow Botanical Gardens and Ostankino Palace. This hotel is within close proximity of Sviblovo Manor and Ostankino TV Tower.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 149 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a hair salon, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and express check-in. Planning an event in Moscow? This hotel has facilities measuring 1743 square feet (162 square meters), including meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a hair salon, and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 149 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Located in Moscow (Marfino), Hotel Sherston is close to Moscow Botanical Gardens and Ostankino Palace. This hotel is within close proximity of Sviblovo Manor and Ostankino TV Tower.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Moscow Botanical Gardens - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Ostankino Palace - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Sviblovo Manor - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Ostankino TV Tower - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
All-Russian Exhibition Centre - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Monument to the Conquerors of Space - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Worker and Kolkhoz Woman - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi
Museum of Cosmonautics - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi
Experimentanium - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Satirikon Theatre - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Lianozovskiy Park - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Jewish Museum and Tolerance Center - 6.7 km / 4.1 mi
Megasport Arena - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Rizhskaya Railway Museum - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Central Armed Forces Museum - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Sherston is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 16.7 km / 10.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
